headline: Better AdTech Stock: AppLovin vs. The Trade Desk
summary: This is the battleground of advertising technology (adtech), representing a total addressable market approaching $1 trillion.  Companies like AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) and The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD) empower brands and publishers to capitalize on the interactions of their audiences.  AppLovin shares are down 45% from their 52-week high, while The Trade Desk stock is down by 53% year to date.
